Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The duration of the pauses were equal or almost equal to one short plus one long P - P interval or to twice the basic sinus cycle .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| P-P interval |
| basic sinus cycle |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| P-P interval |
| basic sinus cycle |

Note: The term "P-P interval" refers to the interval between two consecutive R waves on an electrocardiogram (ECG), which represents the duration of one heartbeat. It is a measure of the electrical activity of the heart and can be considered a chemical process as it involves the ionic movements that generate heartbeats.

Similarly, "basic sinus cycle" refers to a single heartbeat, which includes the P wave, QRS complex, and T wave on an ECG. It represents the electrical activity of the heart and can be considered a chemical process as it involves the ionic movements that generate heartbeats.
